messages.msgSnippet: they have any kind of dughnut you could want!!! we drive almost an hour to get them here. tina

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: ice cream/doughnuts
messages.msgSnippet: Bridget, The fresh baked glazed donuts are the main attraction ... no doubt, but that isn t all there is! They do have the cake donuts with cinnamon sugar, but
messages.messageBody:
Bridget,
The fresh baked glazed donuts are the main attraction ... no doubt, but that isn't all there is! They do have the cake donuts with cinnamon sugar, but they also have chocolate covered donuts with bavarian cream filling. I had a personal relationship with the Krispy Kream crew because of those bavarian cream filled donuts when I was pregnant! lol

Dena

----- Original Message -----
From: rumpleteasermom
Sent: Wednesday, May 01, 2002 9:24 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: ice cream/doughnuts

So maybe that's the problem, I've never had them fresh and hot before.
I don't like glazed donuts I general and I think of KK's as all having
glaze because that's all I've ever seen. Do they make a cake donut
with cinnamon sugar? My personal favorite donut.

Bridget



--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Kathy Sullivan" <mom2fourboys@a...>
wrote:
> lol I LOVE Krispy Kreme doughnuts when they are fresh and hot. But
once they
> cool down, they are nothing special.
>
> Kathy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: ice cream/doughnuts
messages.msgSnippet: You know, I really have no idea. When we lived in Ga. and had a Krispy Kreme near us, we just went in for the fresh glazed. There was usually a LONG line to
messages.messageBody:
You know, I really have no idea. When we lived in Ga. and had a Krispy Kreme
near us, we just went in for the fresh glazed. There was usually a LONG line
to get them too.

Kathy
Mom to Logan 14, Andrew 9, Alexander 5 1/2,
and announcing the newest addition to our family -
Christopher David born 9/20/2001, 4:14pm,
7 pounds 4 oz, 19 3/4 inches long.
Pro: Breastfeeding, childled weaning, Whole Food eating, cloth diapering,
Attachment Parenting, and Unschooling/Homeschooling.
----WAHMall Screen name (mom2fourboys) Ebay Screen Name (Mom2boyss)

"Some people think we put our lives on hold to raise a child, but we know
that to hold a child IS life"

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ice cream/doughnuts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/2002 11:01:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Well, they must NOT have been Krispy Kreme doughnuts! We had two dozen, and they were all
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/2002 11:01:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> If a dozen donuts come in here (it's rare, but when they do), they sit. I
> eat one. One of the kids will eat half. After a couple of days they're
> gone, and sometimes the last two are dipping only.
>
>

Well, they must NOT have been Krispy Kreme doughnuts! We had two dozen, and
they were all gone by noon the next day! <VBWG> And Cameron was looking for
another! :-)

kellyinsc
